nodes.text: Star Wars: The Mandalorian Season 2 Poster Book

Star Wars: The Mandalorian Season 2 Poster Book features artwork from the second season of the television series The Mandalorian in the form of sixteen double-sided pull-out posters. It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on November 3, 2020.

Enjoy 16 full-color pull-out posters of everyone's favorite galactic duo, The Mandalorian and The Child! These images from season two of the hit series will bring the excitement of Star Wars to your room, your locker, or anywhere!
